data.client_settings: Desktop Canary 0.0.180 (Build 7557) - Desktop Stable 0.0.298 (Build 7490) - Web Canary - Web Stable
data.actual_result: An infinite loading symbol appears in the pins box, implying that there is something wrong with the connection etc.
data.expected_result: An informative error should tell you that you are being ratelimited
data.short_description: Being ratelimited for opening pins leaves the pins menu infinitely "loading"
data.steps_to_repro: - Open dev tools (CTRL/CMD+SHIFT+I), you'll want to keep an eye out for an error that ends in " /pins 429 ()" in the coming steps - Open as many different channel pins as quickly as possible until you see the aforementioned error, don't close the one that's open when you see the error - Observe the pins box, repeat step 2 if you clicked off the pins box too fast
